name: Expert Plug
overview: ExpertPlug is an IBT (Internet-Based Training) company based in France that offers online marketplace offering peer-generated IT expert trainings on a platform which features robust search engines and networking opportunities for advanced IT professionals. ExpertPlug allows SAP consultants to conveniently access quality SAP training materials and IT experts to share their knowledge and further leverage their professional reputation and network. ExpertPlug was founded on January 2011, the six months later, the first beta version of ExpertPlug’s website was launched.
